name: Watery Grave
description: Kuzenbo pulls himself inwards under his shell and spins, summoning fierce currents that knock enemies back, increase his movement speed, and allow him to move freely in all directions for 2.1s. Damage after the first spin is reduced by 50%.
stats: Damage First Hit: 80/130/180/230/280 (+40% of your magical power)
Damage Per Hit: 40/65/90/115/140 (+20% of your magical power)
